content: {"name": "Mooresville Lake Norman Christian Mission", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For full services, individuals/families must reside in Zip Codes: 28115, 28117, 28166, 28123, 28125, or 27013.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "266 North Broad Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Mooresville", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28115", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.5851107, "longitude": -80.8108735}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 664-2357", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:15"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:15"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:15"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:15"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required for all members of the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Helps with income, rent, utility and food stamps"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
